Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45337 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.3-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45337 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.3-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-compose is earlier than 2.17.3-9, affected by CVE-2024-45337
